name: Nine Circles
description:
Welcome to Nine Circles

A short physics based platformer with new gameplay mechanics introduced every level. The main focus was on responsive controls and fun, varied levels with a bit of a challenge.
The story is very simple, but I still don't want to spoil it!

I made this game for the GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022 with additional assets contributed by MistryMan29
The theme for the Jam was "DEATH IS ONLY THE BEGINNING!"

Please give it your best, and if you do get stuck, see below for a little assistance.

** Controller is recommended, but also works with keyboard
